idea-plugin.name: Code Review Helper
idea-plugin.description:
A simple and easy-to-use code review tool on the idea-platform
Main functions:
1. You can mark the review opinions in the code and export them to excel table; Or import other people's review opinions into idea, and support double-click to jump to the marked code
2. The review opinions can be confirmed,and can be tracked
3. Provide Server service, so you can switch to the network version, so that the review opinions can be submitted to the server, then others in the team can pull the review opinions from the server to local
一个IDEA平台上简单易用的代码检视问题记录工具。
主要功能：
1、 可以在代码中标记评审意见，并汇总导出为Excel表格；或者将别人的review意见导入到IDEA中，支持代码跳转查看。
2、 可以对评审意见进行确认，填写确认结果，跟踪问题闭环。
3、 提供配套服务端，可以切换到网络版本，评审意见可以提交到服务端，然后团队其他人可以从服务端拉取评审意见到本地。
